mapper.sql: CLASS_NUM as classNum ,TEACHER_NUM as teacherNum ,CLASS_NAME as className ,CLASS_CONTENTS as classContents ,CLASS_START_DATE as classStartDate ,CLASS_END_DATE as classEndDate ,(select count(*) from board group by board_category having board_category = 'class') as classWeek ,classroom_price as classroomPrice
mapper.select: select from classroom where teacher_num = #{teacherNum} order by class_num asc

select class_num, c.teacher_num, class_name, class_contents, class_start_date, class_end_date, (select count(*) from board group by board_category having board_category = 'class') as class_week , classroom_price , teacher_name, teacher_image, teacher_store_image from classroom c join teacher t on c.teacher_num = t.teacher_num order by class_num asc
mapper.insert: Insert into classroom (CLASS_NUM ,TEACHER_NUM ,CLASS_NAME,CLASS_CONTENTS ,CLASS_START_DATE, CLASS_END_DATE, classroom_price) values (#{classNum},#{teacherNum},#{className},#{classContents},#{classStartDate},#{classEndDate}, #{classroomPrice})
